metadata.name: Sacred Order Of The Bulls
metadata.description:
After a wicked bear market, the Bull Run Crew decided to send an elite group of dancing bulls to explore the Cryptoverse. Taking the form of a giant bull head, these intrepid broncos danced their way across blockchains and bear traps in order to arrive at an exciting new destination: the Ethereum blockchain. 

This is the story of their brave voyage, as well as their epic battles alongside factions of Zombulls, Extraterrestribulls, and Robo-Bulls. Upon reaching their destination, they hope to track down the mythical Order Of The Golden Bulls, a secret society comprised of the wisest and rarest creatures in the blockchain. The tale of the Sacred Order of The Bulls (SOBs) will be told through legendary battles and burns rewarding the victors.

Only the most bullish will survive!
